original_title: Documenting the World's First Non-Linear Single Shot Film
overview: The film documents the efforts behind filming "Iravin Nizhal" with 59 settings, over 300 actors and 50 years of time periods. The team had to constantly improvise and creatively handle the challenges that popped up until take 23 was finally "okayed."
title: Documenting the World's First Non-Linear Single Shot Film
